name: Before It's Too Late (BadGatewayGames)
description: One day in 1980, you and some friends decide to go explore an old, abandoned mansion in a forest. While looking around, you get scared to death by the resident ghost, Tobias. He tells you it was an accident and that now you must help him in order to save your friends. The mansion is cursed and anyone there after midnight is trapped there forever. It is your job to learn what scares your friends, use traps accordingly, and make sure they make it out alive, before it's too late!
